Contacted House members urging to Co-Sign a Bipartisan Letter to HHS About Proposed Changes to the 340B Drug Discount Program.  

Contacted House members urging them to ask questions at the Oversight & Government Reform Committee Drug Pricing Hearing regarding the PhRMA initiatives  and 340B

Contacted offices to find out what is going on with PEPFAR.

Requested that Ryan White clinics be used to administer vaccines.
Contacted the Senate regarding the Competition and Anti trust Law Enforcement Reform Act- The Antitrust problems posed by vertical integration and megafirms in the healthcare industry.

Discuss ways in which the federal government can help us and others create and offer desperately needed low income housing for people suffering from HIV, homelessness and the many other ills associated with abject poverty. Get both the Committee and the HHS Department to prioritize the Section 8 SRO program.
Contacted offices to support maintaining the 340B program and stop any legislation to curtail it.

1.Contacted offices to support maintaining the 340B program and stop any legislation to curtail it. 2.Urge Senators and Congresspersons to sigh three letters to each of the major vaccine developers (Pfizer, Moderna and J&J) regarding barriers to global COVID vaccination efforts and implement additional strategies to expand access to vaccines. 3.Contacted Senate to help get a meeting with the new head of HRSA which is the office within HHS that oversees the Ryan White program. 4. Contacted the Director of Health Resources and Services Administration to request a meeting to discuss data collection for the Ryan White program.

Ask Senators to help us get a meeting with the Office of Foreign Assets Control at the Treasury Department so that we can find a legal way to pay employees in Russia running afoul of US sanctions. 2. Contacted the Office of Foreign Assets Control Director to determine what steps AHF must take to ensure that it is compliant with U.S. sanctions on Russia.
